title: Wrist Band Sanitizer Spray Apparatus
description: A wrist band sanitizer spray apparatus for spraying sanitizer on the hands of the user.  The reservoir is connected to a pump which is operated by a battery.  The apparatus is worn on the wrist of the user and the user can spray sanitizer on his hands by pressing the pump.

title: Solar Panel Cleaning Robot
description: A solar panel cleaning robot designed to clean solar panels automatically. The robot uses a brush and water spray system to remove dirt and dust from the surface of the panels. The robot is equipped with sensors to navigate and avoid obstacles while cleaning.

title: Smart Vegetable Garden
description: A smart vegetable garden system that allows users to grow their own vegetables at home. The system includes sensors to monitor soil moisture, temperature, and pH levels. The data is then transmitted to an app that provides users with real-time updates and alerts to optimize plant growth.

title: Self-Driving Delivery Drone
description: A self-driving delivery drone capable of delivering packages to customers. The drone is equipped with GPS, cameras, and other sensors to navigate and avoid obstacles while flying. The drone can also automatically land and take off from delivery locations.
